traits.Aggressive: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
traits.Keen Smell: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Multiattack: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit. reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
